page.title: 19RELIGION IN WATCHET 1985
page.content: {METHODIST CHURCH- }The Church was built in 1871 and is built of stone. It is 20 metres long and 12 metres wide with a upstairs balcony. It holds 200 people upstairs and the same down- stairs. The church as a choir and the service lasts for one hour. There are 2 services on Sunday and 1 women's service, each services raises about Â£50 collection. The minister is the {Rev.Gordon Elford.}The Church hasn't a graveyard. BY JOANNA REED {BAPTIST CHURCH - }The pastor's name is {Mr. Philip Boreham.}The building was built in 1824 and is 30m long, 20m wide and 15m high and is built of stone. The service is 1 hour 15mins long and has about 12 children and 14 adults. The Baptist Church has not got a choir and collection is between Â£30- Â£40. BY DEBBIE ROSS.
